forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
